The design represents the Erdtree foreground against a blue sky.

shields.name: Brass Shield
shields.flavorText:
On the larger side for medium-sized shield, the face has been covered in brass.
Commonly employed in the Shattering.

shields.name: Candletree Wooden Shield
shields.flavorText:
A tall, medium-sized wooden shield. Light for its size, and easy to handle.
Thought to represent a surreptitious prophecy of cardinal sin, the lit candle-tree design was forbidden.

shields.name: Carian Knight's Shield
shields.flavorText:
A teardrop-shaped shield embedded with blue glintstones. Carried by knights who served the Carian royal family.
Excels when facing magic or holy attacks. Just who were these knights preparing to fight?

shields.name: Eclipse Crest Heater Shield
shields.flavorText:
A medium-sized metal shield. Easier to handle than a kite shield.
The sun in eclipse is said to be the symbol of the Wandering Mausoleum where the soulless demigods slumber.

shields.name: Flame Crest Wooden Shield
shields.flavorText:
A tall, medium-sized wooden shield. Light for its size, and easy to handle. Carried by soldiers of the village that is afflicted by frenzy.
The yellow flame is the symbol of the affliction, serving as a warning to those who might approach the village.

shields.name: Great Turtle Shell
shields.flavorText:
Shield fashioned from a great turtle shell. The natural curve helps it contend with foes' attacks.
The turtle is a symbol of tirelessness.

shields.name: Hawk Crest Wooden Shield
shields.flavorText:
A tall, medium-sized wooden shield. Light for its size, and easy to handle.
Adorned with a long-forgotten crest of Stormveil, ancient in design.

shields.name: Heater Shield
shields.flavorText:
A medium-sized metal shield, comparatively easy to handle. 
Metal shields reliably negate physical damage when guarding, a trait which made them highly trusted on the battlefield.

shields.name: Horse Crest Wooden Shield
shields.flavorText:
A tall, medium-sized wooden shield. Light for its size, and easy to handle.
The circular horsehead design evokes a swift gallop.

shields.name: Inverted Hawk Heater Shield
shields.flavorText:
A medium-sized metal shield. Easier to handle than a kite shield.
The inverted hawk is the emblem of the company of slaves ordered to explore the Eternal City.

shields.name: Kite Shield
shields.flavorText:
A standard medium-sized metal shield.
Metal shields reliably negate physical damage when guarding, a trait which made them highly trusted on the battlefield.

shields.name: Large Leather Shield
shields.flavorText:
A round shield covered in leather. One of the larger categories of medium-sized shield.
Though its damage negation may be lacking compared to a metal shield, it can handle wider range of attack affinities.

shields.name: Marred Leather Shield
shields.flavorText:
Leather shield of Stormveil soldiers. Much like the castle, it is marred by mottling and thorns.
Some say it is the curse of grafting which causes such affliction, while others talk of its root being something altogether more sinister hidden deep within the castle.

shields.name: Marred Wooden Shield
shields.flavorText:
Wooden shield of the Stormveil soldiers. Much like the castle, it is marred by mottling and thorns.
Some say it is the curse of grafting which causes such affliction, while others talk of its root being something altogether more sinister hidden deep within the castle.

shields.name: Red Crest Heater Shield
shields.flavorText:
A medium-sized metal shield. Easier to handle than a kite shield.
The crest symbolizes red wings.

shields.name: Round Shield
shields.flavorText:
A wooden roundshield that has been reinforced with metal.
Comparatively light for its size, this shield is easy to handle but lacks a true metal shield's ability to negate damage.

shields.name: Scorpion Kite Shield
shields.flavorText:
A standard medium-sized metal shield. Highly reputed for its solid build and reliability.
Emblazoned with a yellow scorpion, a warning of surprise attacks and sudden strikes.

shields.name: Silver Mirrorshield
shields.flavorText:
Shield of radiant silver, festooned with amber and carried by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree.

The shape is said to imitate that of a sacred drop of dew, which inspired the absurd rumor that Loretta herself was an Albinauric.

shields.name: Sun Realm Shield
shields.flavorText:
Shield of honor depicting a city crowned by the sun. It has seen better days.
Much like the wear upon the shield, the Seat of the Sun is long faded away.

shields.name: Twinbird Kite Shield
shields.flavorText:
Shield featuring a vividly painted twinbird.
The twinbird is said to be the envoy of an outer god, and mother of the Deathbirds.

shields.name: Ant's Skull Plate
shields.flavorText:
Huge head of one of the giant ants which inhabit the two underground rivers, used without modification as a shield. Excels at repeling enemy attacks.
Giant ants are venomous creatures.

shields.name: Briar Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Greatshield from a foreign land, used by Elemer of the Briar. Attacks with this armament utilize the iron thorns that have been wound around its frame.
Originates from Eochaid, a land of proudly solitary ascetics.

shields.name: Crossed-tree Towershield
shields.flavorText:
An iron greatshield large enough to cover the entire body. Emblazoned with an old, interleaving tree.
Greatshields boast high damage negation and guard capacity, making enemy attacks easy to repel.

shields.name: Crucible Hornshield
shields.flavorText:
Greatshield of red-tinged gold carried by Crucible Knights. Features a great horn.
An ancient holiness dwells within. The crucible horn skewers foes when performing shield bashes.

shields.name: Cuckoo Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Metal Greatshield painted with a peering cuckoo. Carried by the enchanted knights sworn to the academy.
Boasting high magic damage negation, this shield is used to hunt down mages.
Our enemy is none other than Caria itself.

shields.name: Distinguished Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Greatshield featuring sumptuous ornamentation used by the scions of great families.
Due to their excessive size, these shields were at times seen as the hallmark of little lordlings who were too timid to earn a few nicks and scratches.

shields.name: Dragon Towershield
shields.flavorText:
Tower shield engraved with a dragon, symbol of protection. Heavy even among greatshields, it possesses exceptional guarding ability
The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.

shields.name: Dragonclaw Shield
shields.flavorText: Greatshield said to have been whittled from the claw of a great, ancient dragon, wielded by grotesque Tree Sentinels who yet serve the Erdtree.

shields.name: Eclipse Crest Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Metal greatshield painted with a sun in eclipse. Carried by the headless mausoleum knights.
The eclipsed sun, drained of color, is the protective star of soulless demigods. It aids the mausoleum knights by keeping Destined Death at bay.

shields.name: Erdtree Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Weighty greatshield forged of gold carried by the order of Tree Sentinels, heavily equipped knights. Blessed by an old incantation of protection.
The living rampart of the Erdtree, the Tree Sentinels are the standard to which all defenders of the Erdtree aspire.

shields.name: Fingerprint Stone Shield
shields.flavorText:
A great stone shield with an intricately carved fingerprint design.
Part of the tomb of an ancient god, the Readerless Fingers relayed their message through these imprints, said to be the very seeds from which frenzy first sprouted.

shields.name: Gilded Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Metal greatshield coated with gold. Carried by knights loyal to Godrick.
The red tinge in the gold coat mirrors the primordial matter that became the Erdtree. The color of homeward yearning.

shields.name: Golden Beast Crest Shield
shields.flavorText:
Shield of dull gold with a beast engraved as its crest. Lighter than most greatshields, and subsequently easier to wield.
The beast depicted is Serosh, aged counselor who guides the golden lineage.

shields.name: Golden Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Oval greatshield made of gold, carried by knights who protect the Royal Capital of Leyndell.
Knights of Leyndell are reputed for their sturdiness, exemplified by this shield's exceptional guard capacity.

shields.name: Guardian's Greatshield
shields.flavorText: Description go here.

shields.name: Haligtree Crest Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Metal greatshield depicting the Haligtree with unalloyed gold. Carried by knights who have vowed to serve Miquella's Haligtree.
Possesses high holy damage negation. Yet now, with the Haligtree misshapen, this wondrous rendition is a fleeting fantasy.

shields.name: Icon Shield
shields.flavorText:
Greatshield painted with a divine scene; the recipients of a blessed tear from the Erdtree. An item that looks back fondly on the age of plenty.
The divine scene acts in and of itself as a sacred invocation.

shields.name: Inverted Hawk Towershield
shields.flavorText:
An iron greatshield large enough to cover the entire body. Features an inverted hawk crest.
Greatshields boast high damage negation and guard capacity, making enemy attacks easy to repel.

shields.name: Jellyfish Shield
shields.flavorText:
The head of a spirit jellyfish, commonly found floating above sacred ground throughout the Lands Between, wielded without modification as a shield.
The see-through head is extremely light, but its flesh is supple, providing absolutely no protection from piercing attacks.

shields.name: Lordsworn's Shield
shields.flavorText:
Wooden tower shield. Lightweight for a greatshield and easy to handle. Commonly used in the Shattering.
Greatshields boast high damage negation and guard capacity, making enemy attacks easy to repel.

shields.name: Manor Towershield
shields.flavorText:
An iron greatshield large enough to cover the entire body. Depicts the Roundtable Hold, gathering place of champions.
Greatshields boast high damage negation and guard capacity, making enemy attacks easy to repel.

shields.name: One-eyed Shield
shields.flavorText:
Tricksome shield made from white stone depicting a malformed one-eyed god. The barrel of a firearm pokes through the open mouth.
Once worshipped by the giants, this evil deity is believed to have been slain by Queen Marika.

shields.name: Redmane Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Greatshield shaped like a fang, featuring the crest of red-maned lion.
Carried by the Redmane Knights who fought alongside Radahn.

shields.name: Spiked Palisade Shield
shields.flavorText: Designed to perform shield bashes, these attacks riddle the enemy with holes, earning it the nickname of "pard shield"

shields.name: Visage Shield
shields.flavorText:
Tricksome bronze shield depicting the face of a Fire Giant. Several tongues leap from its open mouth.
The dreadful visage and burning flames are designed to remind one of the horror of facing a Fire Giant. In other words, this shield has an instructional function.

shields.name: Wooden Greatshield
shields.flavorText:
Wooden greatshield reinforced with a metal ornamentation.
Greatshields boast high damage negation and guard capacity, making enemy attacks easy to repel.

ashesOfWar.name: Alabaster Lord's Pull
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in. Has a greater area of effect than Gravitas.

ashesOfWar.name: Ancient Lightning Spear
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the armament with the ancient dragons' red lightning, then throw it as a spear. Can be charged to increase its power.

ashesOfWar.name: Angel's Wings
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Jump and imbue the wing-blade of the armament with light, then deliver a slashing attack on the enemy.
The white wings impede recovery actions using a flask of tears.

ashesOfWar.name: Assassin's Gambit
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that masks the user's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound. Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps.

ashesOfWar.name: Barbaric Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Let loose a bestial roar to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to savage combo attacks

ashesOfWar.name: Barrage
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery Skill using a bow held horizontally. Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.

ashesOfWar.name: Barricade Shield
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Focus your energy into your shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows.

ashesOfWar.name: Bear Witness
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Grant the small dragon a fleeting glimpse of life and thrust it skyward, spewing flames over a wide frontward area.

ashesOfWar.name: Beast's Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-traveling projectile.

ashesOfWar.name: Black Flame Tornado
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.

ashesOfWar.name: Blade Of Death
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Unleash the power of the Rune of Death to fire off a blade-like projectile.
In addition to dealing immediate damage, the blade reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Blade Of Gold
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Leap into the air, charging the armament with golden flames that are then shot at the enemy as a single, blade-like projectile. Inflicts holy damage.

ashesOfWar.name: Blood Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Blood Tax
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.

ashesOfWar.name: Bloodblade Dance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Leap at foe to perform a flurry of tornado-like attacks.
Follow up with an additional input to perform an attack that ends in an evasive maneuver.

ashesOfWar.name: Bloodboon Ritual
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Raise the sacred spear and pierce the body of the Formless Mother. Stab up to three times, creating explosions of blood with each thrust.
This skill will coat the armament with bloodflame for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Bloodhound's Finesse
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slash upwards with the Bloodhound's Fang, using the momentum of the strike to perform a backwards somersault and gain some distance from foes. Follow up with a strong attack to perform the Bloodhound's Step attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Bloodhound's Step
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep. This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.

ashesOfWar.name: Bloody Slash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.

ashesOfWar.name: Braggart's Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Declare your presence with a boastful roar. Raises attack power, defense and stamina recover speed.

ashesOfWar.name: Bubble Shower
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blow on the horn to release a spume of magic bubbles. The bubbles float gently before raining down on the target.

ashesOfWar.name: Buckler Parry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This is faster than a regular parry.

ashesOfWar.name: Carian Grandeur
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into magical greatsword and swing ti down. Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels.

ashesOfWar.name: Carian Greatsword
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power.

ashesOfWar.name: Carian Retaliation
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing the shield to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

ashesOfWar.name: Charge Forth
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust. Hold to cover a greater distance.

ashesOfWar.name: Chilling Mist
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards. The armament retains its frost for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Claw Flick
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Cause the finger to swell, then flex to build up strength before giving enemies an almighty flick.

ashesOfWar.name: Contagious Fury
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Incite the jellyfish's wrath and allow its fury to flow through you.
Raises attack power for a certain duration.

ashesOfWar.name: Corpse Piler
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Forms a blade of cursed blood for repeated, interweaving successive attacks. Follow up with an additional input for further successive attacks.

ashesOfWar.name: Corpse Wax Cutter
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Lost skill of ancient heroes.
Lift the sword up high to release the power of corpse wax and launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.

ashesOfWar.name: Cragblade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that manipulates gravity. Bury the armament in the ground, pulling rocks from the earth to reinforce it. Increases attack power and makes it easier to break enemy stance.

ashesOfWar.name: Cursed-blood Slice
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Brace, then charge forward to deliver a downward diagonal slice. The bloody trail of the late is followed by a burst of flame. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Death Flare
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Set the lusterless sun ablaze with the Prince of Death's flames, inflicting the death ailment upon foes.
Follow up with an additional input to bring down the armament, triggering an explosion.

ashesOfWar.name: Destined Death
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Set free the remnants of Destined Death, plunging the greatsword into the ground to summon a myriad of blades. In addition to dealing immediate damage, this attack reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a short time.

ashesOfWar.name: Determination
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Devourer Of Worlds
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Charge the scepter with magic and strike it against the ground to steal the HP of all nearby enemies.

ashesOfWar.name: Double Slash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skills of superior swordsmen. Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

ashesOfWar.name: Dynast's Finesse
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Nimbly avoid an attack, securing some distance from foes. Follow up with strong attack to perform a sudden lunge, and press strong attack again to perform a sweeping slice.

ashesOfWar.name: Earthshaker
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

ashesOfWar.name: Eochaid's Dancing Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Infuse the sword with energy, then fling it forwards in a corkscrew attack. The sword continuously deals damage while violently spinning. Charge the attack to increase reach and duration of the spin.

ashesOfWar.name: Enchanted Shot
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill that enlivens the arrow with spiritual essence. The resulting shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target.

ashesOfWar.name: Endure
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.

ashesOfWar.name: Erdtree Slam
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Jump high up into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions. This is the most powerful of all the Ground Slam skills.

ashesOfWar.name: Eruption
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava which spouts up upon release.

ashesOfWar.name: Establish Order
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the armament in a salute, releasing a golden explosion. Repeated inputs send out waves of golden light.

ashesOfWar.name: Familial Rancor
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Gently rattle the copper heads to summon vengeful spirits that chase down foes.
The anguish of a spouse and children invites accursed wrath.

ashesOfWar.name: Flame Dance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the red braid with the Giants' Flame and lash out in a wide range with a series of agile swings.

ashesOfWar.name: Flame Of The Redmanes
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.

ashesOfWar.name: Flame Spit
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Ready the shield, then launch a fireball from the barrel. The fireball explodes on impact.

ashesOfWar.name: Flaming Strike
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc. Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike. This will also coat the armament in fire.

ashesOfWar.name: Flowing Form (Nox Flowing Sword)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form.
Swing the armament like a whip to perform a sweeping slice over a wide area.

ashesOfWar.name: Flowing Form (Nox Flowing Hammer)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form.
Swing the armament like a whip to strike surroundings before slamming its teardrop-shaped head down.

ashesOfWar.name: Frenzyflame Thrust
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the spear with the flame of frenzy and leap forwards, plunging it into the ground and setting off a maddening explosion. The skill inflicts both the enemy and the user with madness.

ashesOfWar.name: Ghostflame Ignition
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Thrust out the barbed rod and set its tip alight with ghostflame.
Follow up with a normal attack to set the ground ablaze with ghostflame, or a strong attack to trigger a massive explosion.

ashesOfWar.name: Giant Hunt
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes. Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.

ashesOfWar.name: Glintstone Dart
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that builds from the Glintstone Pebble sorcery. Charge the skill to upgrade it to Glintstone Dart. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.

ashesOfWar.name: Gold Breaker
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Leap up high and, while suspended in midair, imbue the rune shard with light before smashing it down hard onto the ground.
The heroic Radagon's signature attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Land
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Parry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance. Effective even at a slight distance.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Retaliation
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Ready the shield to unleash its protective incantation.
This will dispel sorceries and incantations, retaliating with golden power.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Slam
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the avatars who protect Minor Erdtrees. Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Tempering
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Cross the two swords to grant their attacks holy essence.
While in effect, strong attack performs a dual-wielding combo attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Golden Vow (skill)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital. Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.

ashesOfWar.name: Gravitas
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill originating from the Alabaster Lords, who had skin of stone. Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in.

ashesOfWar.name: Gravity Bolt
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the jaw of fallingstar beast with gravitational lightning, sending a bolt crashing down a short distance away. Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Great-serpent Hunt
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Perform a powerful forward lunge and follow up with an upward thrust via additional input. When fightning a great serpent, a long blade of light will appear, revealing the armament's true power.

ashesOfWar.name: Great Oracular Bubble
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blow on the horn to release a massive magic bubble. The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

ashesOfWar.name: Ground Slam
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.

ashesOfWar.name: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave. Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.

ashesOfWar.name: Hoarfrost Stomp
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground. The mist applies the frost status effect.

ashesOfWar.name: Holy Ground
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise shield to create an Erdtree-consecrated area that continuously restores HP and boosts defense for self and allies inside it.

ashesOfWar.name: I Command Thee, Kneel!
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Repeatedly smash the Axe of Godrick into the ground, unleashing two earth-shaking shockwaves.
Follow up with an additional input to produce a third shockwave

ashesOfWar.name: Ice Lightning Sword
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Call down a bolt of ice lightning into the blade and bring it down upon a foe.
The ice lightning effect will persist for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Ice Spear
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni. Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.

ashesOfWar.name: Impaling Thrust
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a long thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.

ashesOfWar.name: Kick
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Push an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance. Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.

ashesOfWar.name: Knowledge Above All
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the scepter to manifest the realm of the All-Knowing. Enemy magic and holy damage negation will be reduced for all within the area, including the caster.

ashesOfWar.name: Last Rites
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Raise the epitaph to grant the effect of Sacred Order to yourself
and allies in the vicinity.
Particularly effective at laying to rest Those Who Live in Death.

ashesOfWar.name: Lifesteal Fist
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies.
A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build.

ashesOfWar.name: Lightning Ram
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill inspired by tumbling rams. Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Lightning Slash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock. The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Lion's Claw
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside the General Radahn. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.

ashesOfWar.name: Loretta's Slash (1)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight. Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glinstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.

ashesOfWar.name: Loretta's Slash (2)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight. Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.

ashesOfWar.name: Magma Guillotine
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Grab the scalesword with both hands, as a wyrm would hold it in its mouth, and leap forwards, smashing it into the ground and triggering a blast of magma. Follow up with an additional input to perform a chopping attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Magma Shower
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Slash at foes in a twirling motion while scattering magma all around.
Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Mighty Shot
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill performed from an oblique stance. Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.

ashesOfWar.name: Miquella's Ring Of Light
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Summon Miquella's shining halo and fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Mists Of Slumber
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Releases a faint purple mist that spreads across a wide frontwards area.
This mist inflicts the sleep ailment upon foes.

ashesOfWar.name: Moonlight Greatsword
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Raise the sword aloft, bathing it in the light of the dark moon.
Temporarily increases magic attack power and imbues blade with frost.
Charged attacks release blasts of moonlight.

ashesOfWar.name: Nebula
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Imbue the Naturalborn's stars with magic to perform a sweeping strike.
This attack leaves a dark cloud of stars in its wake that lingers briefly before exploding.

ashesOfWar.name: Night-and-flame Stance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Hold the sword level and prepare to cast a sorcery. Follow up with a normal attack to cast the Night Comet sorcery, or a strong attack to sweep forward with a burst of flames.

ashesOfWar.name: Oath Of Vengeance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swear an oath upon the greatsword to avenge the clan, temporarily raising all attributes for a certain duration. While the oath's effects are active, poise will also be increased.

ashesOfWar.name: Onyx Lord's Repulsion
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack sends enemies flying away.

ashesOfWar.name: Oracular Bubble
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Blow on the horn to release a magic bubble. The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

ashesOfWar.name: Ordovis's Vortex
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Channel the power of the crucible to spin the entire sword in midair, building momentum before slamming the blade down onto the ground.
This skill can be charged to increase its power.

ashesOfWar.name: Parry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.

ashesOfWar.name: Piercing Fang
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter. Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked.

ashesOfWar.name: Phantom Slash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry. Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Poisonous Mist
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Bathe armament in poison, and then slash, spreading toxic mist forwards. The armament retain its poison for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Poison Moth Flight
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Slash with a poison-infused blade. If the
follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significant damage.

ashesOfWar.name: Prayerful Strike
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.

ashesOfWar.name: Prelate's Charge
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge.

ashesOfWar.name: Quickstep
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill prized by the crafty and fleet of foot. Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.

ashesOfWar.name: Radahn's Rain
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow and fire a sudden flurry of arrows up into the sky. The arrows will pour on foes like rain.

ashesOfWar.name: Rain Of Arrows
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles.

ashesOfWar.name: Rallying Standard
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Hoist the war banner aloft and give a rallying command. Raises attack power and defense for self and nearby allies.

ashesOfWar.name: Raptor Of The Mists
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing. If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air.

ashesOfWar.name: Reduvia Blood Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Slash with the wicked dagger, transforming its never-drying bloostains into airborne blood blades that cause hemorrhaging.
Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Regal Beastclaw
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Slam the hammer into the ground, rending the land asunder with the armament's five bestial claws.

ashesOfWar.name: Regal Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Let loose a mighty war cry, raising attack power, while sending out a shockwave that cannot be guarded against by stomping the ground. While active, strong attack becomes a lunging slash.

ashesOfWar.name: Repeating Thrust
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts.

ashesOfWar.name: Rosus's Summons
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Raise the axe aloft to summon those lost in death.
Three skeletons will appear at a distance and attack in tandem before vanishing.

ashesOfWar.name: Royal Knight's Resolve
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord. Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Ruinous Ghostflame
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing the sword to bathe its blade in ghostflame. The ghostflame adds magic damage to attacks, and also has a bitterly cold bite.

ashesOfWar.name: Sacred Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile. The armament retains its holy essence for awhile.

ashesOfWar.name: Sacred Order
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

ashesOfWar.name: Sacred Phalanx
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Release the power of a hidden incantation to erect a palisade of golden spears frontwards.

ashesOfWar.name: Sacred Ring Of Light
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill used by the commanders of the Cleanrot Knights. Gather a sacred ring of light in the armament, and then fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Sea Of Magma
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing a molten whip overhead to temporarily cover the surrounding area in a sea of magma. Hold to continue swinging the lava whip.

ashesOfWar.name: Seppuku
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: A forbidden technique used by swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.

ashesOfWar.name: Shared Order
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Grant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

ashesOfWar.name: Shield Bash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.

ashesOfWar.name: Shield Crash
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered. Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards.

ashesOfWar.name: Shriek Of Milos
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Lets out a horrific cursed scream that reduces all damage negation and status resistances for nearby foes.
While active, strong attacks will change to a combo attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Siluria's Woe
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust the treespear in a spiraling motion, surrounding it in a vortex of wind. Charged attacks have the power to blow away enemies and can fire the tornado forwards.

ashesOfWar.name: Sorcery Of The Crozier
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Channel magic into the glintstone to activate an ancient sorcery, producing floating magic projectiles that chase enemies automatically.

ashesOfWar.name: Soul Stifler
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the greathorn's wings to summon a soul-sapping miasma. Enemies in the affected area will temporarily suffer from reduced defense.

ashesOfWar.name: Spearcall Ritual
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Thrust the spear high, bearing prayers into the sky to summon a downpour of spectral spears.

ashesOfWar.name: Spectral Lance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights. Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Chain
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Spins the striking part of a flail at high speed to attack. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to link the momentum of this skill into a successive attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Slash (1)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill favored by dexterous warriors. Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Slash (2)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill favored by dexterous warriors. Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Strikes
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Weapon
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses. Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.

ashesOfWar.name: Spinning Wheel
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Strike the wheel against the ground to set it spinning at top speed. Hold to keep the wheel spinning. Can be used while walking to push the armament into enemies.

ashesOfWar.name: Square Off
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: This skill starts with the sword held level. Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust.

ashesOfWar.name: Stamp (sweep)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.

ashesOfWar.name: Stamp (upward Cut)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.

ashesOfWar.name: Starcaller Cry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Bring the two swords together and roar into the skies, pulling in enemies with a gravitational wave. Follow up with an additional input to slam down with gravity-infused swords.

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Assault
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Lost skill of Stormveil. Surround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward. Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Kick
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Thrust the prosthetic leg blade into the ground, creating a storm.
Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lightning-infused jumping attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Stomp
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm.

ashesOfWar.name: Storm Wall
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

ashesOfWar.name: Stormcaller
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

ashesOfWar.name: Sky Shot
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from above when it comes down.

ashesOfWar.name: Surge Of Faith
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Set the flames of Birac's faith ablaze in the cranial vessel, then
raise it aloft to rain down fireballs in all directions.
Repeated inputs will continue to raise the armament aloft,
continuing the attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Sword Dance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.

ashesOfWar.name: Taker's Flames
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Raise the sacred sword aloft to set it ablaze with blasphemous flames, then bring it down to fire off a forward blast.
The flames steal HP from those they touch.

ashesOfWar.name: The Queen's Black Flame
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Set the blade ablaze with the god-slaying black flame before delivering a sweeping slash. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack. The black flames will continue to wear down HP for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Thops's Barrier
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

ashesOfWar.name: Through And Through
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance. Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.

ashesOfWar.name: Thunderbolt
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill used by the capital's ancient dragon cult. Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning. Can be fired in rapid succession.

ashesOfWar.name: Thundercloud Form
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Temporarily transform into a red thundercloud and fly through the air, then plunge down with a lightning-infused blade. Hold to increase the reach of the thundercloud form.

ashesOfWar.name: Thunderstorm
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the armament's wing-blade with lightning and swing it around to create a tempestuous lightning storm. Follow up with an additional input to perform up to two spinning attacks. The lightning will stay on the blade for a while.

ashesOfWar.name: Tongues Of Fire
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Ready the shield, then spray violent jets of fire from the tongues protruding from its maw. Hold to continue spraying fire. This skill can be used while walking.

ashesOfWar.name: Transient Moonlight
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance.
Follow up with either a normal or a strong attack to draw the blade at great speed for an instant slash attack. Both attacks fire off a wave of light.

ashesOfWar.name: Troll's Roar
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Look into the distance and let out an intense roar, generating a powerful shockwave that blows back surrounding foes. Follow up with a strong attack to slam the armament down.

ashesOfWar.name: Unblockable Blade
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Imbue the cipher blade with light, extending its length, then strike with a sudden sweeping attack.
This attack cannot be blocked.

ashesOfWar.name: Unsheathe
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.

ashesOfWar.name: Vacuum Slice
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Lost skill of ancient heroes. Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearin vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.

ashesOfWar.name: Viper Bite
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Give the shield a quick shake to temporarily bring the bronze viper to life, inciting it to lash out and bite foes.

ashesOfWar.name: Vow Of The Indomitable
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Skill of the ancient warriors of the Erdtree. Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility.

ashesOfWar.name: War Cry
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.

ashesOfWar.name: Waterfowl Dance
ashesOfWar.effectDescription:
Perform a series of one-footed leaps in the manner of a waterfowl to unleash a swift yet graceful slashing combo.
Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

ashesOfWar.name: Wave Of Gold
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Imbue the sword with bygone golden glory, then fire it at foes. A wide, golden wave fans out forwards, sweeping through all enemies caught in its path.

ashesOfWar.name: Waves Of Darkness
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

ashesOfWar.name: Wave Of Destruction
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Raise the sword up high, then strike it against the ground to fire off a wave of gravitational force.

ashesOfWar.name: Wild Strikes
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Swing armament with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.

ashesOfWar.name: White Shadow's Lure
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Hold armament in a brief, silent prayer to create a white shadow. The apparition lures in foes of human build who are not in combat, drawing their aggression. Effective on demi-humans even if they are already in a combat state.

ashesOfWar.name: Wolf's Assault
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Infuse the greatsword with frost, then perform a forward somersault to plunge it into the ground. Then, pull it out to release a cold blast.

ashesOfWar.name: Zamor Ice Storm (skill)
ashesOfWar.effectDescription: Plunge the curved sword into the ground, building power before unleashing a freezing storm that batters the surroundings.

talismans.name: Shard of Alexander
talismans.effectDescription: Greatly boosts the attack power of Skills.

talismans.name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
talismans.effectDescription: Raises attack power for a duration when Poisoning or Rot occurs in the vicinity.

talismans.name: Lord of Blood's Exultation
talismans.effectDescription: Raises attack power for a duration when Blood Loss occurs in the vicinity.
